remarks: Dual vector space of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdval.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcdval.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcdval.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcdval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdval $p |- ( ph -> C = ( D |`s { f e. F | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } ) ) $.
$d F f $.
$d K f $.
$d W f $.
